actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to revive the provisions of section 514 of the Public Works and Economic Development Act of 1965.

summary.text: Authorizes the Federal cochairmen of each Regional Action Planning Commission to acquire and dispose of excess property, under the Public Works and Economic Development Act of 1965.

titles.title: A bill to revive the provisions of section 514 of the Public Works and Economic Development Act of 1965.
